prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has a sleek, serpentine body and vibrant blue scales.
Show me a Pokemon with unique sea creature features, including fins and a spiral tail.
Imagine a dragon-type Pokemon with aquatic elements and a striking color palette.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a mythical sea serpent with spiky accents and a curled tail.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of the ocean with flowing shapes and shades of blue.
Give me a water-type Pokemon that looks elegant and has a calm demeanor, perfect for underwater environments.
Make a Pokemon that has both dragon and water attributes, featuring a distinctively shaped head and fins.
